verses.text: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tune \w of|strong="H5921"\w* “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Distant|strong="H7350"\w* Oaks.” \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Miktam \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* seized \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*. \w Be|strong="H1732"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* men \w are|strong="H7350"\w* hounding \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w all|strong="H5921"\w* day \w they|strong="H5921"\w* press \w their|strong="H5921"\w* attack.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* enemies pursue \w me|strong="H2603"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* many proudly assail \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.
\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am afraid, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* put \w my|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God, whose word \w I|strong="H3117"\w* praise—\w in|strong="H3117"\w* God \w I|strong="H3117"\w* trust. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3372"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w What|strong="H3372"\w* can man do \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3372"\w*?

\w All|strong="H6213"\w* day \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* twist \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* demise.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* conspire, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* lurk, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* watch \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps \w while|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* wait \w to|strong="H5921"\w* take \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5315"\w* spite \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w such|strong="H1992"\w* sin, \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* escape? \w In|strong="H5315"\w* \w Your|strong="H8104"\w* anger, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, cast down \w the|strong="H8104"\w* nations.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wanderings. \w Put|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tears \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* bottle—\w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* book?

\w Then|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* enemies \w will|strong="H3808"\w* retreat \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day \w I|strong="H7760"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3808"\w* help. \w By|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5612"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* side.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w whose|strong="H3045"\w* word \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whose|strong="H3045"\w* word \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*,

\w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* trust; \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* afraid. \w What|strong="H1697"\w* can man \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w Your|strong="H6213"\w* vows \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* render thank offerings \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* delivered \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w from|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w and|strong="H5088"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H5921"\w* stumbling, \w that|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* may walk \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* life.
